page.title: 09A BARNARD CASTLE PUBLICAN
page.content: My name is Emma Dobson,I am 10 years old.My parents run a public house in Barnard Castle called the Cricketers Arms.We have the public bar and lounge where meals are served and my mam does the cooking.Friday nights and Saturdays are the busiest times.The men like Strongarm Ale and the ladies drink lager, martini or wine.For entertainment we have a Juke Box,a one armed bandit ,dart board and dominoes. Our darts and dominoes teams play other pub teams.Our customers are mostly local people of all ages and anyone causing trouble is barred,but this does not often happen.Mam and Dad have one day off a week and two weeks holiday a year.A friend comes in to run the pub for us then.
